title: Bugsplat loop after champion select
body:
Hi everyone,

After the recent patch 9.3 I have been unable to play League of Legends. Once champion select has concluded and the game begins to launch, I am hit with a bug-splat explaining that something is wrong with my installation and will continuously refresh the client while trying to re-load the game and displaying the error multiple times, never making it to the loading screen.

I have attempted to repair my client multiple times, however this does not fix the problem.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/463189539821846540/542520347493400582/unknown.png

This bug has resulted in two remake games, as shown here.
https://gyazo.com/93c9e18bbf7018a2fba5fd6b24ec26fd

I cannot download and reinstall the game as I am using Optus wireless broadband and lack the data allowance to do so. Is riot aware of the problem? Apparently it's quite common at the moment. 

Thanks, 
Silky.

replies.body: Having the same issue. I have tried the Full Repair in Settings, but loop still happening

I've been having the exact same problem :/ this isnt fun, especially when its my ranked games. It's also the first time ive been getting this sort of thing for a long time. I've been doing a full repair everytime is happens, but nothing seems to fix.
It was a known issue and the fix rolled out last night so everything should be good now (though still test in a custom first).
I had this problem today i uninstall game and redownloaded it. thanks to 900mb down load speed butt when i went to click play the had voted to quit at 8 mins. my friend told them i was trying get in.
